definition[0]: a thin piece of material that women wear to cover their faces at formal occasions or for religious reasons
example[0]: She lifted her veil with both hands.
definition[1]: to cover something with a veil
example[2]: A black kerchief modestly veiled her hair.
definition[2]: to partly hide something so that it cannot be seen clearly
example[3]: A fine rain was beginning to veil the hills.
